Interested

Below mention fields are very popular among all the fields in computer science. These are the main branch of the Computer Science. I am very interested in the Machine Learning and Data science.Also, flutter is using in the making android and iOS apps.

AI/ML

Machine Learning is an approach or subset of Artificial Intelligence that is based on the idea that machines can be given access to data along with the ability to learn from it.

Data Science

Data science is all about using data to solve problems. The problem could be decision making such as identifying which email is spam and which is not.

Software Developer

A computer programmer, sometimes called a software developer, a programmer or more recently a coder, is a person who creates computer software.

Flutter

Flutter is an open-source UI software development kit created by Google. It is used to develop applications for Android, iOS, Linux, Mac, Windows codebase.

Recent Projects

Black-Jack

Python Code

Blackjack, formerly also Black Jack and Vingt-Un, is the American member of a global family of banking games known as Twenty-One, whose relatives include the British game of Pontoon and the European game, Vingt-et-Un.

Dicee Game

HTML and CSS and Javascript code

The Dicee game is based on the HTML and CSS and Javascript. When you open this site and refresh the site then the dicee change the number and based on that player 1 and player 2 win. However, the player 1 and player 2 get the same number then the match is draw.

Bootstrap Site

Provide some predefine class

The Bootstrap is developed by the twitter. It uses in the making responsive web-site. It provides some predefine css class that makes very easy for the coder. Also, by using this we can use site in the smaller size screen that looks very nice in that.

Blog Site

Using Jquery and EJS

Blog site is the where we can upload the new things that people wants to know about. Everyday, we have to update site and this provide some relavent information. Also, everyone can update this site. For this site, we use Jquery and EJS templating and we launch our site on Heroku.
